channel.title: Help me, please
channel.description:
Excuse me, all moparisthebest.com members, i have a little problem with my mopar client.
I have clicked on " new server " and i have typed in a servers ip and pressed ok. I made an username and logged in, but it takes a while and says " cannot connect to server. Must be down" I have used my wireless connection, broadband connection, allowed the client through my firewall, and it still does the same thing. If anyone can tell me a way i can fix it, i will be gladly appreciated.
1337pl0x
:cool:

item.title: Help me, please
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“1337pl0x, post:1, topic:237962”]Excuse me, all moparisthebest.com members, i have a little problem with my mopar client.

I have clicked on " new server " and i have typed in a servers ip and pressed ok.
I made an username and logged in, but it takes a while and says " cannot connect to server. Must be down"
I have used my wireless connection, broadband connection, allowed the client through my firewall, and it still does the same thing.
If anyone can tell me a way i can fix it, i will be gladly appreciated.

1337pl0x

[/quote] That means the server is not currently on, try looking servers in the server status page. You need silab client for most of them…

Read full topic
